text: This is a list of chapters for the manga series Major 2nd, written by Takuya Mitsuda and serialized in Weekly Shōnen Sunday. The first chapter appeared in a 2015 issue; Over one hundred and fifty chapters have been published as of September 15, 2018. __TOC__ == Volume list == ==Chapters not yet in tankōbon format== *193. *194. *195. *196. *197. ==References==
title: List of Major 2nd volumes
